channel.title: Comments for page "Pokey Stick"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Pokey Stick"

item.title: Reference
item.content:encoded:
The pokey stick is a reference to the 'How to defend yourself against a maniac wielding a banana' skit of Monty Pythons flying circus.

In it one character says
"What if he has a bunch of banana's?"
Instructor: "Shut up"
"What if he has a pointy stick"
Instructor: "SHUT UP!"
